entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:11 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: S 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow becoming mixed with ice pellets early in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 6. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 7:43 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
